A scientifically proven weight-loss method centered around a revolutionary 20-minute interval training program
Based on a scientifically proven interval training program incorporating eight-second sprints, this all-in-one manual provides quick, easy-to-follow guidance for increasing fitness and strength levels in a time-efficient, effective way.
